about_the_game:
Untraveled Lands: Chantico – A Thrilling Card-Based Survival Craft Adventure

Dive into the captivating world of Untraveled Lands: Chantico, a unique mix of card-based gameplay, survival craft, and roguelike elements, inspired by the exciting adventures of jungle explorers. Set against the rich, mystical backdrop of Mesoamerican cultures, legends, and relics, this game takes you deep into jungles hidden in time and mystery. Immerse yourself in a retro ambiance evoking the 1930s, wrapped up in an enthralling adventure that calls to the explorer within.



Survival Crafting: Master survival with intuitive card-based crafting. Build shelters, craft tools, and ensure your village thrives amidst the jungle's challenges.



Exploration: Discover hidden temples and ancient relics as you navigate through lush, uncharted territories. Each card reveals new paths and secrets in your quest for home.



Story-Driven Adventure: Embark on a story-driven journey, solving puzzles and uncovering the mysteries of ancient civilizations. Your choices shape the adventure in this card-driven world.



Dynamic Encounters: Face off against wild beasts and formidable foes. Assemble a team of allies with cards that bring strategic depth to each encounter.



Passionately Crafted: Immerse yourself in stunning visuals inspired by classic exploration tales, where every card paints a part of this captivating jungle adventure.



Enhanced Replayability: Enjoy a new adventure every time with procedurally generated maps and scenarios, ensuring each playthrough is unique and challenging.

Dive into the captivating world of Untraveled Lands: Chantico, a unique mix of card-based gameplay, survival craft, and roguelike elements, inspired by the exciting adventures of jungle explorers. name: Untraveled Lands: Chantico Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10.0 Compatible GPU
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Explore the wild depths of "Untraveled Lands: Chantico" a captivating card-based survival management game mixed with roguelike elements. Build a village, manage survivors, craft essential items and equipment. Unravel jungle mysteries to find your way home through a world lost in time.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
